short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sort, Explore and Share PS2 Preferences with ease!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Extension injects a new table at the top of BITS' Practice School site, which contains all the relevant information about each project of the currently selected station on BITS' PSMS site. (Stipend, Branches, Project Description, ect).
The injected panel also provide new ways to add/remove items to the top or to the bottom of the already sorted list, helping in much faster. No need to go to different pages to get different info.
The extension also allows you to save and load your preferences as an excel sheet. This way, you can share it with your friends, and also have a backup in case PSMS bugs out and does not save preferences.

What's New:
Updated the extension to work on the new site for second-semester.
